includedAssets.title: The Freshman
includedAssets.synopsis: As Buffy adjusts to college life, she realises that her classmates are mysteriously disappearing.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Buffy adjusts to college life, she realises that her classmates are mysteriously disappearing.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Buffy adjusts to college life, she realises that her classmates are mysteriously disappearing.

includedAssets.title: Living Conditions
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy finds herself at odds with her new roommate... and is troubled by a series of disturbing dreams involving a soul-sucking demon.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy finds herself at odds with her new roommate... and is troubled by a series of disturbing dreams involving a soul-sucking demon.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy finds herself at odds with her new roommate... and is troubled by a series of disturbing dreams involving a soul-sucking demon.

includedAssets.title: The Harsh Light Of Day
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep3 - The Harsh Light Of Day
includedAssets.synopsis: As Buffy has an affair with a handsome student, Spike searches for a ring that, according to legend, makes the wearer invincible.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Buffy has an affair with a handsome student, Spike searches for a ring that, according to legend, makes the wearer invincible.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Buffy has an affair with a handsome student, Spike searches for a ring that, according to legend, makes the wearer invincible.

includedAssets.title: Fear, Itself
includedAssets.synopsis: On Halloween, Buffy and her friends find themselves trapped inside a haunted house complete with bats, zombies and a terrifying demon from beyond.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: On Halloween, Buffy and her friends find themselves trapped inside a haunted house complete with bats, zombies and a terrifying demon from beyond.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: On Halloween, Buffy and her friends find themselves trapped inside a haunted house complete with bats, zombies and a terrifying demon from beyond.

includedAssets.title: Beer Bad
includedAssets.synopsis: Xander finds employment as a bartender at a pub where some of Buffy's friends metamorphose into terrifying Cro-Magnon creatures.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Xander finds employment as a bartender at a pub where some of Buffy's friends metamorphose into terrifying Cro-Magnon creatures.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Xander finds employment as a bartender at a pub where some of Buffy's friends metamorphose into terrifying Cro-Magnon creatures.

includedAssets.title: Wild At Heart
includedAssets.synopsis: Oz finds himself unable to control his attraction to a sexy singer... who just happens to be a werewolf. Guest starring James Marsters as Spike.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Oz finds himself unable to control his attraction to a sexy singer... who just happens to be a werewolf. Guest starring James Marsters as Spike.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oz finds himself unable to control his attraction to a sexy singer... who just happens to be a werewolf. Guest starring James Marsters as Spike.

includedAssets.title: The Initiative
includedAssets.synopsis: Spike finds himself targeted by a group of commandos after he escapes from a futuristic lab located beneath the streets of Sunnydale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Spike finds himself targeted by a group of commandos after he escapes from a futuristic lab located beneath the streets of Sunnydale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Spike finds himself targeted by a group of commandos after he escapes from a futuristic lab located beneath the streets of Sunnydale.

includedAssets.title: Pangs
includedAssets.synopsis: On Thanksgiving, Buffy encounters the spirit of a Native American warrior whose people were wiped out by settlers. Guest starring David Boreanaz as Angel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: On Thanksgiving, Buffy encounters the spirit of a Native American warrior whose people were wiped out by settlers.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: On Thanksgiving, Buffy encounters the spirit of a Native American warrior whose people were wiped out by settlers. Guest starring David Boreanaz as Angel.

includedAssets.title: Something Blue
includedAssets.synopsis: One of Willow's spells causes her every wish to come true. Giles goes blind, Buffy and Spike plan a wedding and Xander becomes a demon-magnet!
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: One of Willow's spells causes her every wish to come true. Giles goes blind, Buffy and Spike plan a wedding and Xander becomes a demon-magnet!
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: One of Willow's spells causes her every wish to come true. Giles goes blind, Buffy and Spike plan a wedding and Xander becomes a demon-magnet!

includedAssets.title: Hush
includedAssets.synopsis: A group of murderous creatures straight out of a fairy tale steal the townspeople's voices.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A group of murderous creatures straight out of a fairy tale steal the townspeople's voices.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A group of murderous creatures straight out of a fairy tale steal the townspeople's voices.

includedAssets.title: Doomed
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy attempts to stop demons who are determined to bring about the apocalypse by re-opening the Hellmouth.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy attempts to stop demons who are determined to bring about the apocalypse by re-opening the Hellmouth.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy attempts to stop demons who are determined to bring about the apocalypse by re-opening the Hellmouth.

includedAssets.title: A New Man
includedAssets.synopsis: After being transformed into a demon, Giles attempts to track down Ethan Rayne in the hope of reversing the process.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After being transformed into a demon, Giles attempts to track down Ethan Rayne in the hope of reversing the process.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After being transformed into a demon, Giles attempts to track down Ethan Rayne in the hope of reversing the process.

includedAssets.title: The I In Team
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep13 - The I In Team
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy teams up with Riley after she is allowed access to the mysterious underground complex known as the Initiative.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy teams up with Riley after she is allowed access to the mysterious underground complex known as the Initiative.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy teams up with Riley after she is allowed access to the mysterious underground complex known as the Initiative.

includedAssets.title: Goodbye Iowa
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy and Riley's relationship is put to the test when she investigates Professor Walsh's death and comes up against the Initiative's secret weapon.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy and Riley's relationship is put to the test when she investigates Professor Walsh's death and comes up against the Initiative's secret weapon.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy and Riley's relationship is put to the test when she investigates Professor Walsh's death and comes up against the Initiative's secret weapon.

includedAssets.title: This Year's Girl
includedAssets.synopsis: Faith (Eliza Dushku) awakens from her coma and comes in search of Buffy - and revenge.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Faith (Eliza Dushku) awakens from her coma and comes in search of Buffy - and revenge.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Faith (Eliza Dushku) awakens from her coma and comes in search of Buffy - and revenge.

includedAssets.title: Who Are You
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy, having switched bodies with Faith, finds herself at the mercy of Watcher council members. Meanwhile, Faith uses Buffy's body for her own ends.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy, having switched bodies with Faith, finds herself at the mercy of Watcher council members. Meanwhile, Faith uses Buffy's body for her own ends.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy, having switched bodies with Faith, finds herself at the mercy of Watcher council members. Meanwhile, Faith uses Buffy's body for her own ends.

includedAssets.title: Superstar
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy tries to figure out why the town thinks a former high-school nerd is now a superhero.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy tries to figure out why the town thinks a former high-school nerd is now a superhero.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy tries to figure out why the town thinks a former high-school nerd is now a superhero.

includedAssets.title: Where The Wild Things Are
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep18 - Where The Wild Things Are
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy and Riley's passionate love-making energises supernatural elements inside a frat house.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy and Riley's passionate love-making energises supernatural elements inside a frat house.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy and Riley's passionate love-making energises supernatural elements inside a frat house.

includedAssets.title: New Moon Rising
includedAssets.synopsis: Oz returns to Sunnydale one last time and is captured by the Initiative during a full moon. Willow tells Buffy about her relationship with Tara.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Oz returns to Sunnydale one last time and is captured by the Initiative during a full moon. Willow tells Buffy about her relationship with Tara.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oz returns to Sunnydale one last time and is captured by the Initiative during a full moon. Willow tells Buffy about her relationship with Tara.

includedAssets.title: The Yoko Factor
includedAssets.synopsis: Riley spars with Angel, while Adam advances his plans for humanity's demise by enlisting Spike to turn the gang against one another.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Riley spars with Angel, while Adam advances his plans for humanity's demise by enlisting Spike to turn the gang against one another.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Riley spars with Angel, while Adam advances his plans for humanity's demise by enlisting Spike to turn the gang against one another.

includedAssets.title: Primeval
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy's estrangement from her friends threatens the prevention of Adam's plan to design a master race of human/demon hybrids.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy's estrangement from her friends threatens the prevention of Adam's plan to design a master race of human/demon hybrids.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy's estrangement from her friends threatens the prevention of Adam's plan to design a master race of human/demon hybrids.

includedAssets.title: Restless
includedAssets.synopsis: This last episode of the current series explores the reactions of the Scooby Gang after the climactic events of the previous episode.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: This last episode of the current series explores the reactions of the Scooby Gang after the climactic events of the previous episode.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: This last episode of the current series explores the reactions of the Scooby Gang after the climactic events of the previous episode.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: As Buffy and Willow enrol at college, the Scooby Gang begin to get some help from an unexpected source. Fourth season of Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar and Alyson Hannigan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Buffy enrols at college, the Scooby Gang get some help from an unexpected source. Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Buffy and Willow enrol at college, the Scooby Gang begin to get some help from an unexpected source. Fourth season of Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar and Alyson Hannigan.

includedIn.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer
includedIn.synopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.

title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer Season 4
synopsis: As Buffy and Willow enrol at college, the Scooby Gang begin to get some help from an unexpected source. Fourth season of Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama starring Sarah Michelle Gellar and Alyson Hannigan.
